text: Kaya tumhi tyanna nahi pahile, jyanna adesa dila gela ki apalya hatanna rokhuna theva ani namaja niyamita padhata raha ani jakata ada karita raha, maga jevha tyanna jihada (dharmayud'dha) ca adesa dila gela tevha tyaca veli tyancyatala eka samuha, lokampasuna asa bhayabhita hota, janu allahace bhaya asave, kimbahuna yapeksa adhika ani mhanu lagale, he amacya palanakartya! Tu amacyavara jihada anivarya ka kele? Anakhi thode jivana amhala ka vyatita karu dile nahi? Tumhi tyanna sanga ki ya jagaca labha tara phara thodasa ahe ani allahace bhaya rakhanaryankarita akhirata kititari uttama ahe, ani tumacyavara eka dhagya'itakahi atyacara kela janara nahi
